name: SupportSalehAndMyrrh
_source: speak;Myrrh;Saleh, wherever we go, you're always at my side.|Don't you ever do anything YOU want to do?
speak;Saleh;I came from Caer Pelyn.|I have been entrusted with the honor of being your escort.|Protecting you, Great Dragon, gives my life meaning.
speak;Myrrh;Great Dragon?|Please, there's no need to call me that.|My father is the great one.|I've done nothing.|I'm not great at all.

speak;Saleh;It is true, Great Dragon, that your exalted father once saved mankind.|On that day so long ago, he shielded us from evil.|He is our true savior.|However, mankind has forgotten that most sacred debt we owe him.|I do, as we all must, what I can to atone for that crime of neglect.
speak;Saleh;Great Dragon, does my presence bother you?|If it does, please do not hesitate to tell me.|I would remove myself at once and not bother you again until needed.
speak;Myrrh;There's something I wanted to ask.|You're from Caer Pelyn.|Do you know if my father has ever visited your village?

speak;Saleh;He has.|I myself have never seen his noble personage.|However, I have heard that Dara met him once when she was young.|Some monsters had wandered into Caer Pelyn, and the Great Dragon saved us.
speak;Myrrh;Really?|I wonder why my father chose to help you.
speak;Saleh;That, I cannot guess.|We poor humans cannot hope to grasp the thinking of the Great Dragon.

speak;Myrrh;My father has dedicated his life to protecting humans.|For the longest time, I could not fathom why he would do this.|But now, after spending time with all of you...|I begin to understand how he felt.
speak;Myrrh;I'm sure that I-|that I will continue to fight, as he did, for all humanity.
speak;Saleh;I am truly grateful that you feel that way, Great Dragon.
speak;Saleh;Great Dragon...|I know I'm being rude, but I've a favor to ask.
speak;Saleh;Would you please come to our village?
speak;Saleh;Dara and the other villagers would be overjoyed to see you.|The village is quite spare, but we would do our best to entertain you.|You could stay for as long as you wanted...
speak;Myrrh;Saleh, you made that request on my behalf, didn't you?
speak;Saleh;No, not at all.|I apologize.|I have been disrespectful.
speak;Myrrh;No, I'm pleased.|However...|I doubt I should stay too long.
speak;Myrrh;It's because I'm a dragon.|My father explained it to me.|We are both human and monster.|And because we are both, we are also neither.

speak;Myrrh;We have the power of dragons.|Therefore, we cannot live together with humans...|We have the hearts of humans.|Therefore, we do not belong with monsters.|We are outcasts in this world, never a part of either community.|And so we live our lives alone, never to be understood by anyone.

speak;Saleh;But there are humans whose actions make them monsters in the eyes of others.|I do not think of you as such when there are many worse monsters among my own kind.|Regardless, I believe the villagers would be most pleased to have you visit.
speak;Myrrh;Saleh...|Thank you.|Your words have cheered me up a little.|Please wait for my answer.|When all of this is finished...|When peace returns, I'll give you my answer then.

speak;Myrrh;And when I do return to Darkling Woods, I will not be sad.|Because of the time I've spent with you, the memories you've given me, I shall not be lonely.|I shall never feel like an outcast again.
